item.title: AI coding mandates are driving developers to the brink
item.description: Under pressure to embrace AI, developers are growing frustrated by misguided mandates and are left to clean up any collateral damage inflicted on their codebase.

item.title: Test out .NET 10 Previews in Dev Containers & Codespaces in Minutes!

item.title: Writing C for curl
item.description: It is a somewhat common question to me: how do we write C in curl to make it safe and secure for billions of installations? Some precautions we take and decisions we make.
